eu.ensg.jade.xml

Class XMLTerrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ensg.jade.xml.XMLTerrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXMLExport

    public class XMLTerrain
extends java.lang.Object
implements IXMLExport
    XMLTerrain is the class which hold data representing a terrain, as defined in a scene.xml file

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLTerrain

        public XMLTerrain(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String imageHeightmap)
        Constructor with basic informations
        Parameters:
        id - the ID used for the terrain
        imageHeightmap - the path to the grayscale image used as a heightmap

      • XMLTerrain

        public XMLTerrain(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String imageHeightmap,
                  int terrainSize)
        Constructor with basic informations + size of the terrain
        Parameters:
        id - the ID used for the terrain
        imageHeightmap - the path to the grayscale image used as a heightmap
        terrainSize - the terrain's size (which must be a power of 2)

      • toXMLElement

        public org.w3c.dom.Element toXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        Description copied from interface: IXMLExport
        Convert a set of data, stored in class parameters, to an XML Element. This method is used to write the content of the class to an XML file with the correct format
        Specified by:
        toXMLElement in interface IXMLExport
        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        Returns:
        a new element that can be added to the XML file
        See Also:
        IXMLExport.toXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document)
